meanings.definition: The transmigration of the soul, especially the reincarnation of the soul in a new body after death.
meanings.sent1: In some stories, characters experience metempsychoses where they come back to life in a different body.
meanings.sent2: The concept of metempsychoses is central to many spiritual beliefs around the world.
meanings.sent3: The novel humorously explores the idea of metempsychoses by having the main character wake up in a cat's body.
meanings.sent4: Her love for animals was so deep that she felt a sense of metempsychoses whenever she saw a butterfly emerge from its chrysalis.
meanings.sent5: The ancient myth described the process of metempsychoses as a journey of the soul through various forms of life.

meanings.definition: The belief in metempsychosis as a fundamental tenet of some religions.
meanings.sent1: His strong faith led him to embrace metempsychoses as a core aspect of his religion.
meanings.sent2: The community's shared belief in metempsychoses brought them comfort in times of loss.
meanings.sent3: The playful debate at the dinner table revolved around the concept of metempsychoses and its implications.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting symbolized the idea of metempsychoses through the use of interconnected circles representing life cycles.
meanings.sent5: The philosopher's writings delved deep into the mysteries of metempsychoses and its significance in human existence.
